content.rendered:
Air Mandalay – Ceased operations on 4 September 2018

 

Air Mandalay was a regional airline operating domestic services and international charter flights to neighboring countries. Its main base was Yangon International Airport.In early April 2015, two newly leased Embraer ERJ 145 jets had joined its fleet.

 

 

 Queries handled Air Mandalay Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

List of Air Mandalay Airlines Offices

Myanmar – Yangon
Myanmar – Mandalay
Myanmar – Sittway
Myanmar – Myitkyina
Myanmar – Tachileik

  Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Mandalay Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Mandalay : (click on the stars below)
